{{{
/*******************************************************************************
 CSS Document
 Date:- 11/3/2009
 Created By:- Deepak Shakya
 Description :- Provides the markup for the apple menu
*******************************************************************************/

body
{
	font:bold 20px 'Trebuchet MS';
	color:#3399FF;
}


#container
{
	border:1px solid #CCCCCC;
	position:relative;
	overflow:hidden;
	height:100px;
	width:20px;
}

#container .menuitem
{
	position:absolute;
	border-bottom:1px solid #CCCCCC;
	width:100%;
	background:white;
	text-align:center;
	cursor:pointer;
}

#container .menuitem .item_header
{
	font:bold 16px 'Trebuchet MS';
	border:0px solid black;
}

#container .menuitem .item_body
{
	font:12px 'Verdana';
	text-align:center;
	border:0px solid black;
}

#container .menuitem .item_footer
{
	font:bold 12px 'Verdana';
	/*border:1px solid black;*/
}

#container .menuitem .item_body img
{
	border:1px dotted white;
}
}}}
